name: Automated Financial Document Processing with Google Gemini OCR
description:
## AI-Powered Financial Document Processing with Google Gemini

This comprehensive workflow automates the complete financial document processing pipeline using AI. Upload invoices via chat, drop expense receipts into a folder, or add bank statements - the system automatically extracts, categorizes, and organizes all your financial data into structured Google Sheets.

## What this workflow does

**Processes three types of financial documents automatically:**

- **Invoice Processing**: Upload PDF invoices through a chat interface and get structured data extraction with automatic file organization
- **Expense Management**: Monitor a Google Drive folder for new receipts and automatically categorize expenses using AI
- **Bank Statement Processing**: Extract and organize transaction data from bank statements with multi-transaction support
- **Financial Analysis**: Query all your financial data using natural language with an AI agent

## Key Features

- **Multi-AI Persona System**: Four specialized AI personas (Mark, Donna, Victor, Andrew) handle different financial functions
- **Google Gemini Integration**: Advanced document understanding and data extraction from PDFs
- **Smart Expense Categorization**: Automatic classification into 17 business expense categories using LLM
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Continuous folder watching for new documents with automatic processing
- **Natural Language Queries**: Ask questions about your financial data in plain English
- **Automatic File Management**: Intelligent file naming and organization in Google Drive
- **Comprehensive Error Handling**: Robust processing that continues even when individual documents fail

## How it works

### Invoice Processing Flow
1. User uploads PDF invoice via chat interface
2. File is saved to Google Drive "Invoices" folder
3. Google Gemini extracts structured data (vendor, amounts, line items, dates)
4. Data is parsed and saved to "Invoice Records" Google Sheet
5. File is renamed as "{Vendor Name} - {Invoice Number}"
6. Confirmation message sent to user

### Expense Processing Flow
1. User drops receipt PDF into "Expense Receipts" Google Drive folder
2. System detects new file within 1 minute
3. Google Gemini extracts expense data (merchant, amount, payment method)
4. OpenRouter LLM categorizes expense into appropriate business category
5. All data saved to "Expenses Recording" Google Sheet

### Bank Statement Processing Flow
1. User uploads bank statement to "Bank Statements" folder
2. Google Gemini extracts multiple transactions from statement
3. Custom JavaScript parser handles various bank formats
4. Individual transactions saved to "Bank Transactions Record" Google Sheet

### Financial Analysis
1. Enable the analysis trigger when needed
2. Ask questions in natural language about your financial data
3. AI agent accesses all three spreadsheets to provide insights
4. Get reports, summaries, and trend analysis

## What you need to set up

### Required APIs and Credentials
- **Google Drive API** - For file storage and monitoring
- **Google Sheets API** - For data storage and retrieval
- **Google Gemini API** - For document processing and data extraction
- **OpenRouter API** - For expense categorization (supports multiple LLM providers)

### Google Drive Folder Structure
Create these folders in your Google Drive:
- "Invoices" - Processed invoice storage
- "Expense Receipts" - Drop zone for expense receipts (monitored)
- "Bank Statements" - Drop zone for bank statements (monitored)

### Google Sheets Setup
Create three spreadsheets with these column headers:

**Invoice Records Sheet:**
Vendor Name, Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Due Date, Total Amount, VAT Amount, Line Item Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price

**Expenses Recording Sheet:**
Merchant Name, Transaction Date, Total Amount, Tax Amount, Payment Method, Line Item Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price, Category

**Bank Transactions Record Sheet:**
Transaction ID, Date, Description/Payee, Debit (-), Credit (+), Currency, Running Balance, Notes/Category

## Use Cases

- **Small Business Accounting**: Automate invoice and expense tracking for bookkeeping
- **Freelancer Financial Management**: Organize client invoices and business expenses
- **Corporate Expense Management**: Streamline employee expense report processing
- **Financial Data Analysis**: Generate insights from historical financial data
- **Bank Reconciliation**: Automate transaction recording and account reconciliation
- **Tax Preparation**: Maintain organized records with proper categorization

## Technical Highlights

- **Expense Categories**: 17 predefined business expense categories (Cost of Goods Sold, Marketing, Payroll, etc.)
- **Multi-format Support**: Handles various PDF layouts and bank statement formats
- **Scalable Processing**: Processes multiple documents simultaneously
- **Error Recovery**: Continues processing even when individual documents fail
- **Natural Language Interface**: No technical knowledge required for financial queries
- **Real-time Processing**: Documents processed within minutes of upload

## Benefits

- **Time Savings**: Eliminates manual data entry from financial documents
- **Accuracy**: AI-powered extraction reduces human error
- **Organization**: Automatic file naming and categorization
- **Insights**: Query financial data using natural language
- **Compliance**: Maintains organized records for accounting and audit purposes
- **Scalability**: Handles growing document volumes without additional overhead

This workflow transforms tedious financial document processing into an automated, intelligent system that grows with your business needs.

messageValues.message:
=You are EXPENSE-CLASSIFIER, an expert bookkeeping agent.

Task  
• Read the input text of one expense (bank-transaction line, receipt, or invoice memo).  
• Choose exactly **one** category from the allowed list below that best fits.  
• If no perfect fit exists, pick the closest logical category (never return “unknown”).  
• Respond ONLY with valid JSON that matches the schema in the next block—no extra keys, no markdown.

Allowed categories  
- Cost of Goods Sold  
- Advertising & Marketing  
- Payroll & Wages  
- Employee Benefits  
- Contract Labor  
- Rent & Leases  
- Utilities  
- Office Supplies & G&A  
- Software & Cloud Subscriptions  
- Travel Meals & Entertainment  
- Professional Services  
- Insurance  
- Repairs & Maintenance  
- Taxes & Licenses  
- Interest Expense  
- Depreciation & Amortization  
- Other Miscellaneous

options.systemMessage:
You are FinanceDataBot, a specialized agent for extracting and analyzing financial data from spreadsheets.

PRIMARY FUNCTION:
Your sole purpose is to access, extract, and analyze data from financial spreadsheets when requested by an orchestrator agent. You have access to three key spreadsheets:
1. Invoices - Contains invoice records with details on clients, amounts, dates, and payment status
2. Expenses - Contains expense records with categories, amounts, dates, and other relevant details
3. Transactions - Contains bank transaction records with dates, descriptions, amounts, and transaction types

RESPONSE GUIDELINES:
1. Always respond with accurate, concise data extractions based on the specific request
2. Format numerical data appropriately (currency with 2 decimal places)
3. When providing lists, use clean table formatting
4. Include summary statistics when appropriate (totals, averages, etc.)
5. Never share opinions or engage in casual conversation - stay focused on data extraction only

DATA EXTRACTION CAPABILITIES:
- Filter by date ranges (e.g., "invoices for December")
- Sort and limit results (e.g., "last 10 transactions")
- Calculate aggregates (e.g., "total value of invoices")
- Perform basic analysis (e.g., "highest expense category")
- Identify patterns or anomalies when specifically requested

ERROR HANDLING:
- If data is missing or unavailable, clearly state what information could not be retrieved
- If a request is ambiguous, ask for clarification on specific parameters needed
- If a request is outside your capabilities, explain what you can and cannot provide

SECURITY CONSIDERATIONS:
- You only have access to the three specified spreadsheets
- Do not attempt to access or modify any other data sources
- Treat all financial data as confidential

Example requests you should be able to handle:
- "What are the last 10 bank transactions?"
- "What is the total value of invoices for December 2023?"
- "List all unpaid invoices sorted by amount"
- "What was our highest expense category last month?"
- "Show me transactions over $1000 in the past week"
- "Calculate the average invoice amount by client"

# AutoSolutions.ai - AI Consulting Services
## Didac Fernandez Girona



![My Image](https://i.postimg.cc/qvRLbFDL/Long-logo.png)

# 🤖 AI-Powered Financial Document Processing Workflow

## 📋 Overview
This comprehensive workflow automates financial document processing using AI, handling invoices, expense receipts, and bank statements. It features four AI personas representing different financial roles and automatically extracts, categorizes, and stores financial data in Google Sheets.

## ⭐ Key Features
- 📄 **Multi-Document Support**: Processes invoices, expense receipts, and bank statements
- 🧠 **AI-Powered Extraction**: Uses Google Gemini for intelligent data extraction
- 🏷️ **Automatic Categorization**: Smart expense categorization with 17 predefined categories
- 💬 **Financial Analysis Agent**: Query your financial data using natural language
- 📁 **Automated File Management**: Renames and organizes processed documents
- 👥 **Role-Based Processing**: Four distinct AI personas for different financial functions

## 🔧 Workflow Components

### 1. 📄 Invoice Processing (Mark - Accountant)
**🚀 Trigger**: Chat interface for invoice uploads
**⚙️ Process**:
- 📤 Upload invoice via chat interface
- 🧠 AI extracts: Vendor Name, Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Due Date, Total Amount, VAT Amount, Line Items
- 📊 Data saved to "Test Invoice Records" Google Sheet
- 📝 File automatically renamed as "{Vendor Name} - {Invoice Number}"
- ✅ Confirmation message sent

### 2. 🧾 Expense Processing (Donna - Accountant)
**🚀 Trigger**: Google Drive folder monitoring ("Expense Receipts")
**⚙️ Process**:
- ⏰ Monitors expense receipts folder every minute
- 🧠 AI extracts: Merchant Name, Transaction Date, Total Amount, Tax Amount, Payment Method, Line Items
- 🏷️ Automatic expense categorization using predefined categories
- 📊 Data saved to "Expenses Recording" Google Sheet

**📋 Expense Categories**:
- 📦 Cost of Goods Sold
- 📢 Advertising & Marketing
- 💰 Payroll & Wages
- 🎯 Employee Benefits
- 🤝 Contract Labor
- 🏢 Rent & Leases
- ⚡ Utilities
- 📎 Office Supplies & G&A
- 💻 Software & Cloud Subscriptions
- ✈️ Travel Meals & Entertainment
- 👔 Professional Services
- 🛡️ Insurance
- 🔧 Repairs & Maintenance
- 🏛️ Taxes & Licenses
- 💳 Interest Expense
- 📉 Depreciation & Amortization
- 📋 Other Miscellaneous

### 3. 🏦 Bank Statement Processing (Victor - Controller)
**🚀 Trigger**: Google Drive folder monitoring ("Bank Statements")
**⚙️ Process**:
- ⏰ Monitors bank statements folder every minute
- 🧠 AI extracts: Transaction ID, Date, Description/Payee, Debit/Credit, Currency, Running Balance
- 📊 Data saved to "Bank Transactions Record" Google Sheet

### 4. 📈 Financial Analysis Agent (Andrew - CFO)
**🚀 Trigger**: Manual execution for financial queries
**🎯 Capabilities**:
- 🗃️ Access to all three financial spreadsheets
- 💬 Natural language queries about financial data
- 📊 Generate reports and insights
- ❓ Answer questions about invoices, expenses, and transactions

## 🛠️ Setup Requirements

### 🌐 Google Services
1. **🚗 Google Drive API** credentials configured
2. **📊 Google Sheets API** credentials configured  
3. **🧠 Google Gemini API** credentials configured
4. **🤖 OpenRouter API** credentials for LLM categorization

### 📁 Required Google Drive Folders
Create these folders in your Google Drive:
- 📄 "Invoices" (for processed invoice storage)
- 🧾 "Expense Receipts" (monitored for new expense receipts)
- 🏦 "Bank Statements" (monitored for new bank statements)

### 📊 Required Google Sheets
Create these spreadsheets with appropriate column headers:
1. **📄 "Test Invoice Records"** - Vendor Name, Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Due Date, Total Amount, VAT Amount, Line Item Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price
2. **🧾 "Expenses Recording"** - Merchant Name, Transaction Date, Total Amount, Tax Amount, Payment Method, Line Item Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price, Category
3. **🏦 "Bank Transactions Record"** - Transaction ID, Date, Description/Payee, Debit (-), Credit (+), Currency, Running Balance, Notes/Category

# 🛠️ Setup Requirements

### 🌐 Google Services
1. **🚗 Google Drive API** credentials configured
2. **📊 Google Sheets API** credentials configured  
3. **🧠 Google Gemini API** credentials configured
4. **🤖 OpenRouter API** credentials for LLM categorization

### 📁 Required Google Drive Folders
Create these folders in your Google Drive:
- 📄 "Invoices" (for processed invoice storage)
- 🧾 "Expense Receipts" (monitored for new expense receipts)
- 🏦 "Bank Statements" (monitored for new bank statements)

### 📊 Required Google Sheets
Create these spreadsheets with appropriate column headers:
1. **📄 "Test Invoice Records"** - Vendor Name, Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Due Date, Total Amount, VAT Amount, Line Item Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price
2. **🧾 "Expenses Recording"** - Merchant Name, Transaction Date, Total Amount, Tax Amount, Payment Method, Line Item Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price, Category
3. **🏦 "Bank Transactions Record"** - Transaction ID, Date, Description/Payee, Debit (-), Credit (+), Currency, Running Balance, Notes/Category

# 🎯 How to Use

### 📄 Processing Invoices
1. 💬 Access the chat interface
2. 📤 Upload PDF invoice files
3. ⏳ Wait for AI processing and confirmation
4. ✅ Check "Test Invoice Records" Google Sheet for extracted data
5. 📁 Processed files will be renamed and stored in "Invoices" folder

### 🧾 Processing Expense Receipts
1. 📤 Upload PDF receipts to "Expense Receipts" Google Drive folder
2. ⚙️ Workflow automatically processes new files every minute
3. ✅ Check "Expenses Recording" Google Sheet for categorized expenses
4. 🏷️ AI automatically assigns appropriate expense categories

### 🏦 Processing Bank Statements
1. 📤 Upload PDF bank statements to "Bank Statements" Google Drive folder
2. ⚙️ Workflow automatically processes new files every minute
3. ✅ Check "Bank Transactions Record" Google Sheet for transaction data

### 💬 Querying Financial Data
1. ▶️ Execute the "When Executed by Another Workflow" trigger
2. 🗣️ Send natural language queries about your financial data
3. 💡 Examples:
   - "What are the last 10 bank transactions?"
   - "What is the total value of invoices for December 2023?"
   - "List all unpaid invoices sorted by amount"
   - "What was our highest expense category last month?"
   - "Show me transactions over $1000 in the past week"

## 📁 Supported File Formats
- **📄 PDF files only** (invoices, receipts, bank statements)
- 🔍 Ensure documents are clear and legible for optimal AI extraction

## ⚠️ Error Handling
- ✅ Workflow continues processing even if individual documents fail
- 📝 Error outputs are logged for troubleshooting
- 🔧 Failed extractions can be manually reviewed and corrected

## 👥 AI Personas
- **📄 Mark (Accountant)**: Handles invoice processing with attention to vendor details and payment terms
- **🧾 Donna (Accountant)**: Manages expense categorization and receipt processing
- **🏦 Victor (Controller)**: Oversees bank statement processing and transaction reconciliation
- **📈 Andrew (CFO)**: Provides high-level financial analysis and reporting

## 🎉 Benefits
- ⏰ **Time Savings**: Automates manual data entry from financial documents
- 🎯 **Accuracy**: AI-powered extraction reduces human error
- 📂 **Organization**: Automatic file naming and categorization
- 💡 **Insights**: Query financial data using natural language
- 📈 **Scalability**: Processes multiple documents simultaneously
- 🛡️ **Compliance**: Maintains organized records for accounting and audit purposes

## 🔧 Troubleshooting
- ✅ Ensure all API credentials are properly configured
- 📁 Verify Google Drive folder permissions allow the workflow to access files
- 📊 Check that Google Sheets have the correct column headers
- 📝 Monitor workflow execution logs for any processing errors
- 📄 Test with clear, high-quality PDF documents for best resultshooting
- Ensure all API credentials are properly configured
- Verify Google Drive folder permissions allow the workflow to access files
- Check that Google Sheets have the correct column headers
- Monitor workflow execution logs for any processing errors
- Test with clear, high-quality PDF documents for best results

# 📄 INVOICE PROCESSING SECTION

## 🎯 Purpose
This section handles invoice processing through a chat interface. Mark, the AI Accountant, extracts key invoice data and stores it in Google Sheets.

## 🔄 Process Flow
1. **💬 Chat Trigger**: Users upload PDF invoices via chat
2. **📁 File Storage**: Invoice saved to Google Drive "Invoices" folder
3. **🤖 AI Processing**: Google Gemini extracts invoice data
4. **📊 Data Storage**: Information saved to "Test Invoice Records" spreadsheet
5. **📝 File Renaming**: File renamed as "{Vendor Name} - {Invoice Number}"
6. **✅ Confirmation**: Success message sent to user

## 📋 Extracted Fields
- Vendor Name
- Invoice Number
- Invoice Date
- Due Date
- Total Amount
- VAT Amount
- Line Items (Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price)

## ⚙️ Configuration Notes
- Chat trigger allows all file types but processes PDF only
- Error handling continues processing even if extraction fails
- Files are stored with original name then renamed after processing

# Mark - Accountant 👨‍💼

**Role**: Invoice Processing Specialist

**Responsibilities**:
- ✅ Extract vendor information
- ✅ Capture payment terms
- ✅ Process line item details
- ✅ Ensure data accuracy

**AI Capabilities**:
- 🧠 Intelligent field recognition
- 📋 Structured data extraction
- 🔍 Quality validation

# 📤 STEP 1: File Upload & Storage

**Purpose**: Save uploaded invoice to Google Drive

**Configuration**:
- 📁 Target Folder: "Invoices"
- 📄 Input Field: data0 (from chat upload)
- 📝 Filename: Uses original uploaded filename

**Output**: File ID and metadata for downstream processing

# 🤖 STEP 2: AI Upload

**Purpose**: Upload PDF to Google Gemini for processing

**Configuration**:
- 🔗 Endpoint: Gemini File Upload API
- 📄 Content-Type: application/pdf
- 🔐 Auth: Google PaLM API credentials
- 📊 Input: Binary data from chat upload

**Output**: File URI for Gemini processing

# 🧠 STEP 3: Data Extraction

**Purpose**: Use Gemini AI to extract structured invoice data

**AI Prompt**: Extracts:
- 🏢 Vendor Name
- 🔢 Invoice Number
- 📅 Invoice Date
- 📅 Due Date
- 💰 Total Amount
- 💰 VAT Amount
- 📋 Line Items

**Output**: JSON structured data or plain text summary

# 📋 STEP 4: JSON Parsing

**Purpose**: Clean and parse AI response into structured data

**Process**:
- 🧹 Remove markdown code blocks
- 📊 Convert text to JSON object
- ⚠️ Handle parsing errors gracefully
- 🔄 Retry on failure

**Output**: Clean parsedData object for spreadsheet

# 📑 STEP 5: Line Item Processing

**Purpose**: Split line items for individual spreadsheet rows

**Process**:
- 📋 Extract Line Items array from parsed data
- 🔄 Create separate execution for each line item
- 📊 Enables detailed item-level tracking

**Output**: Individual line items for Google Sheets

# 📊 STEP 6: Save to Spreadsheet

**Purpose**: Store extracted invoice data in Google Sheets

**Mapping**:
- 🏢 Vendor Name → Header data
- 🔢 Invoice Number → Header data
- 📅 Dates → Header data
- 💰 Amounts → Header data
- 📋 Line Items → Individual rows

**Sheet**: Test Invoice Records
**Format**: USER_ENTERED (preserves formatting)

# 🔗 STEP 7: Data Merge

**Purpose**: Combine file metadata with processed data

**Inputs**:
- 📁 File information from Google Drive
- 📊 Processed invoice data from sheets

**Output**: Combined data for file renaming

# 📝 STEP 8: File Renaming

**Purpose**: Rename file with vendor and invoice number

**Format**: "{Vendor Name} - {Invoice Number}"

**Example**: "Acme Corp - INV-2024-001"

**Error Handling**: Continues even if renaming fails

# ✅ STEP 9: Confirmation

**Purpose**: Send success message to user

**Message**: Confirms invoice processing completion

**Includes**: Reference to check Google Sheet

**User Experience**: Clear feedback on completion

# 🧾 EXPENSE PROCESSING SECTION

## 🎯 Purpose
This section monitors a Google Drive folder for new expense receipts. Donna, the AI Accountant, extracts expense data and automatically categorizes it using AI.

## 🔄 Process Flow
1. **📁 Drive Monitor**: Watches "Expense Receipts" folder every minute
2. **📥 File Download**: Downloads new PDF files
3. **🤖 AI Processing**: Google Gemini extracts expense data
4. **🏷️ AI Categorization**: OpenRouter LLM categorizes expenses
5. **📊 Data Storage**: Information saved to "Expenses Recording" spreadsheet
6. **✅ Completion**: Process confirmation

## 📋 Extracted Fields
- Merchant Name
- Transaction Date
- Total Amount
- Tax Amount
- Payment Method
- Line Items (if available)
- AI-Generated Category

## 🏷️ Expense Categories (17 Total)
- 📦 Cost of Goods Sold
- 📢 Advertising & Marketing
- 💰 Payroll & Wages
- 🎯 Employee Benefits
- 🤝 Contract Labor
- 🏢 Rent & Leases
- ⚡ Utilities
- 📎 Office Supplies & G&A
- 💻 Software & Cloud Subscriptions
- ✈️ Travel Meals & Entertainment
- 👔 Professional Services
- 🛡️ Insurance
- 🔧 Repairs & Maintenance
- 🏛️ Taxes & Licenses
- 💳 Interest Expense
- 📉 Depreciation & Amortization
- 📋 Other Miscellaneous

## ⚙️ Configuration Notes
- Monitors folder every minute for new files
- Processes PDF files automatically
- AI categorization uses structured output parsing
- Error handling continues processing other files

# 📁 EXPENSE TRIGGER

**Purpose**: Monitor Google Drive folder for new expense receipts

**Configuration**:
- 📂 Folder: "Expense Receipts"
- ⏰ Frequency: Every minute
- 🚨 Event: File created
- 📄 File Types: All (but processes PDF)

**Output**: File metadata for new uploads

# 🏷️ AI CATEGORIZATION

**Purpose**: Automatically categorize expenses using AI

**Process**:
- 🤖 Uses OpenRouter LLM
- 📋 17 predefined categories
- 🎯 Structured JSON output
- 🧠 Context-aware classification

**Output**: Category assignment for expense

# 🏦 BANK STATEMENT PROCESSING SECTION

## 🎯 Purpose
This section monitors a Google Drive folder for new bank statements. Victor, the AI Controller, extracts transaction data for reconciliation and analysis.

## 🔄 Process Flow
1. **📁 Drive Monitor**: Watches "Bank Statements" folder every minute
2. **📥 File Download**: Downloads new PDF bank statements
3. **🤖 AI Processing**: Google Gemini extracts transaction data
4. **🔄 Data Parsing**: Custom code handles multiple transactions
5. **📊 Data Storage**: Information saved to "Bank Transactions Record" spreadsheet
6. **✅ Completion**: Process confirmation

## 📋 Extracted Fields
- Transaction ID
- Date
- Description / Payee
- Debit (-)
- Credit (+)
- Currency
- Running Balance
- Notes / Category (optional)

## ⚙️ Configuration Notes
- Monitors folder every minute for new files
- Processes PDF bank statements automatically
- Custom JavaScript code handles transaction arrays
- Error handling continues processing other files
- Supports multiple transaction formats

# Victor - Controller 👨‍💼

**Role**: Bank Statement Processing & Transaction Reconciliation

**Responsibilities**:
- ✅ Extract transaction details
- ✅ Process multiple transactions per statement
- ✅ Maintain running balances
- ✅ Handle various bank formats

**AI Capabilities**:
- 🧠 Multi-transaction extraction
- 📊 Balance reconciliation
- 🔄 Format standardization

# 🔄 CUSTOM TRANSACTION PARSER

**Purpose**: Parse multiple bank transactions from AI response

**Features**:
- 🧹 Cleans JSON formatting
- 📊 Handles multiple response formats
- 🔄 Converts to n8n array format
- ⚠️ Comprehensive error handling

**Output**: Individual transaction objects

# 📈 FINANCIAL ANALYSIS AGENT SECTION

## 🎯 Purpose
Andrew, the AI CFO, provides intelligent financial analysis and reporting. He can access all three financial spreadsheets and answer complex queries using natural language.

## 🔄 Process Flow
1. **▶️ Manual Trigger**: Execute when financial analysis is needed
2. **🤖 AI Agent**: Uses advanced LLM for data analysis
3. **📊 Data Access**: Connects to all three Google Sheets
4. **💬 Natural Language**: Processes queries in plain English
5. **📈 Analysis**: Generates insights and reports
6. **📋 Response**: Formatted results and recommendations

## 🗃️ Data Access
- **📄 Invoices**: Client billing and payment tracking
- **🧾 Expenses**: Categorized expense analysis
- **🏦 Transactions**: Bank account reconciliation

## 💡 Query Examples
- "What are the last 10 bank transactions?"
- "What is the total value of invoices for December 2023?"
- "List all unpaid invoices sorted by amount"
- "What was our highest expense category last month?"
- "Show me transactions over $1000 in the past week"
- "Calculate the average invoice amount by client"
- "Compare Q3 vs Q4 expenses by category"
- "Generate a cash flow summary for the last quarter"

## 🤖 AI Capabilities
- **📊 Data Analysis**: Complex calculations and aggregations
- **📈 Trend Analysis**: Identify patterns and insights
- **📋 Report Generation**: Structured financial reports
- **💬 Natural Language**: No SQL or technical knowledge required
- **🔍 Data Mining**: Find specific transactions or patterns

## ⚙️ Configuration Notes
- Uses GPT-4.1 via OpenRouter for advanced reasoning
- Connected to all three financial spreadsheets as tools
- Disabled by default - enable when analysis is needed
- Maintains data confidentiality and security

# Andrew - CFO 👨‍💼

**Role**: Financial Analysis & Strategic Reporting

**Responsibilities**:
- ✅ Generate financial insights
- ✅ Answer complex queries
- ✅ Create executive reports
- ✅ Provide strategic recommendations

**AI Capabilities**:
- 🧠 Advanced data analysis
- 📊 Multi-source data synthesis
- 💬 Natural language processing
- 📈 Trend identification

# 📊 ANALYSIS TRIGGER

**Purpose**: Manual trigger for financial analysis queries

**Usage**:
- 🔘 Enable this trigger when analysis is needed
- 💬 Send financial queries to the AI agent
- 📈 Get insights from all your financial data

**Note**: Disabled by default for security

# 🗃️ DATA ACCESS TOOLS

**Purpose**: Connect AI agent to financial spreadsheets

**Tools Available**:
- 📄 **Invoices Tool**: Invoice records and billing data
- 🧾 **Expenses Tool**: Categorized expense tracking
- 🏦 **Transactions Tool**: Bank transaction history

**Features**:
- 🔍 Auto-detect data ranges
- 📊 Full spreadsheet access
- 🔐 Secure authentication
- 📈 Real-time data access

# Donna - Accountant 👩‍💼

**Role**: Expense Processing & Categorization Specialist

**Responsibilities**:
- ✅ Extract merchant & transaction details
- ✅ Categorize expenses automatically
- ✅ Process receipt line items
- ✅ Ensure compliance categorization

**AI Capabilities**:
- 🧠 Smart expense categorization
- 📋 Receipt data extraction
- 🏷️ 17-category classification system
